name: Electivire
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

poke_power.name: Motor Drive
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a {L} Energy card and attach it to Electivire. This power can’t be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy attached to Electivire. Flip a coin for each {L} Energy you discarded. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
